Text: Will seed for as long as possible, please be considerate and do the same.

I've been seeding this torrent for you guys on my cable internet for 6 months and I've only gotten one comment on the torrent? You guys suck. If you're going to take the time to download the books, at least leave me a comment and let me know what you thought of it.
don't know what this is..but thanx for uploading..curious to find out//ah sweet!! an rpg?! thats so cool!

I registered here just to comment on this torrent. Thank you JtotheC240, you have done a great job compiling this collection. I loved Werewolf more than any other RPG I ever played and I have many of the books in this collection but not all.

Thank you again, man, great torrent.

@Circadian78. That's why I compiled it, no one else on the internet has a full torrent. I'm only half a dozen books or so away from having the entire oWoD collection compiled and that's going to be the next thing I upload.
All of the WoD books? That's damn impressive. Much appreciated J, cheers once more!

This is AWESOME!!  I LOVE the character sheets!  Makes it a LOT easier to make characters.  Was wondering though, I've been trying to find a world of darkness book.  I THINK it was just called WOD Combat.  It had a bunch of fighting styles and such in it.  Any ideas?
Sweet ass torrent bud, lots of thanks!
@Armoredwerewolf. I have that book, and have uploaded it with a small collection of misc. WOD of darkness books for you. Here's the link: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7252581
I have been looking for this so thank you very much, really made the best day so far.
